thread.title: UCT operations to return to normal on Tuesday (University of Cape Town)
thread.title_full: UCT operations to return to normal on Tuesday (University of Cape Town) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: UCT operations to return to normal on Tuesday (University of Cape Town)
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) Dear colleagues and students I am writing to inform you that university operations will proceed as normal tomorrow. Whilst we cannot predict all possible scenarios, we wish for the University of Cape Town
